user-prompt-submit-hook.command: powershell -Command "Add-Type -AssemblyName System.Speech; $speak = New-Object System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer; $speak.Speak('Task complete'); $timestamp = Get-Date -Format 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss'; $log = '{0} - Response completed' -f $timestamp; Add-Content -Path 'claude-activity.log' -Value $log"
user-prompt-submit-hook.description: Play audio notification when response is complete

task-complete.command: powershell -Command "Add-Type -AssemblyName System.Speech; $speak = New-Object System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer; $speak.Speak('complete'); $timestamp = Get-Date -Format 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss'; $log = '{0} - Task completed: {1}' -f $timestamp, $env:CLAUDE_TASK; Add-Content -Path 'claude-activity.log' -Value $log"
task-complete.description: Play audio notification and log activity when task completes

after-edit.command: powershell -Command "$timestamp = Get-Date -Format 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss'; $log = '{0} - Edited file: {1}' -f $timestamp, $env:CLAUDE_FILE_PATH; Add-Content -Path 'claude-activity.log' -Value $log"

after-write.command: powershell -Command "$timestamp = Get-Date -Format 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss'; $log = '{0} - Created/wrote file: {1}' -f $timestamp, $env:CLAUDE_FILE_PATH; Add-Content -Path 'claude-activity.log' -Value $log"

after-bash.command: powershell -Command "$timestamp = Get-Date -Format 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss'; $log = '{0} - Executed command: {1}' -f $timestamp, $env:CLAUDE_COMMAND; Add-Content -Path 'claude-activity.log' -Value $log"

after-read.command: powershell -Command "$timestamp = Get-Date -Format 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss'; $log = '{0} - Read file: {1}' -f $timestamp, $env:CLAUDE_FILE_PATH; Add-Content -Path 'claude-activity.log' -Value $log"
